"I would highly recommend this company if your in need of a new roof." "Wonderful Customer Service and a great way to take care of his employees." "They are great people who actually lookout and care for the homeowners!"

Hammerhead roofing, is the best roofing company I’ve ever experienced. The professionalism and the amount of care with every visit is honestly crazy amazing. Brian was so great, you can tell this is more than just a job to him. It’s love … More

This company is Amazing. They started on time, worked their butts off, and also fed us lunch. Their crew was awesome. They did a covering around the whole perimeter of the home the day before to protect the house and AC unit from debris … More Response from the owner 9 months ago Thank you for the opportunity to serve you Kristina and for the referral to your neighbor! Glad you were able to join us for lunch during Griddle Time on both occasions

Always been a good experience with Hammerhead Roofing! Peter has helped us out so much, he’s super knowledgeable and honest! With Peter and this company, you will know what you’re getting! The communication is excellent as well, from the whole team! 10/10 More Response from the owner 2 months ago
